set(CAR_SOURCES
  avtOUTCARFileFormat.C
  )

set(POS_SOURCES
  avtPOSCARFileFormat.C
  )

set(CHG_SOURCES
  avtCHGCARFileFormat.C
  )

ADD_VISIT_READER(VisItOUTCARReader "1.0"
  VISIT_READER_TYPE "MTSD"
  VISIT_READER_NAME "avtOUTCARFileFormat"
  SERVER_SOURCES ${CAR_SOURCES}
  )

ADD_VISIT_READER(VisItPOSCARReader "1.0"
  VISIT_READER_TYPE "STSD"
  VISIT_READER_NAME "avtPOSCARFileFormat"
  SERVER_SOURCES ${POS_SOURCES}
  )

ADD_VISIT_READER(VisItCHGCARReader "1.0"
  VISIT_READER_TYPE "MTSD"
  VISIT_READER_NAME "avtCHGCARFileFormat"
  SERVER_SOURCES ${CHG_SOURCES}
  )
